1.definition: the act of declaring [ of dividends] [ of war]

2 a.definition: the first pleading in a common-law action compare,

sub_terms.b: a statement usually not under oath made by a party to a legal transaction [the attorney must later sign an affidavit or stating that he has informed the debtor "J. H. Williamson"]
sub_terms.c: a statement not under oath being offered as evidence

declaration against interest.definition: a statement made by someone unavailable as a witness that is against that person's own interests (as pecuniary or property interests) or may subject that person to liability compare,,
declaration against interest.note: A declaration against interest is an exception to the hearsay rule. A statement that is offered to clear the accused is not admissible without corroborating circumstances under the Federal Rules of Evidence.

dy·ing declaration.definition: a statement that is made by a person who firmly believes that he or she is about to die and has no hope of recovery and that concerns the circumstances or cause of the presumed death compare,
dy·ing declaration.note: Dying declarations are an exception to the hearsay rule and can be admitted as evidence only if the declarant is unavailable as a witness.

self-serving declaration.definition: a statement made out of court that is in the declarant's own interest

spon·ta·ne·ous declaration.definition: [spÄ n-tā-nē-əs-]an excited utterance that is made without time for fabrication called alsocompare
spon·ta·ne·ous declaration.note: Spontaneous declarations are exceptions to the hearsay rule under the excited utterance exception.

sub_terms.a: a statement proclaiming the principles, aims, or policies of a group or government [ of rights] compare,
sub_terms.b: a statement of the value of property that is subject to a tax (as a duty)a statement of the amount of tax estimated to be due (as on property or income) see alsocompare
sub_terms.c: a statement of information (as year, make, and model) regarding the subject (as a car) and coverage of an insurance policy

4.definition: a statement creating or giving notice of the creation of a legal entity, relationship, or statusthe instrument embodying such a statement

declaration of condominium.definition: a declaration of the creation of a condominium that includes a description of the common and individual interests and obligations compareat

declaration of homestead.definition: a declaration by a qualified property owner by which the protection of a homestead exemption is effectuated

declaration of trust.definition: a declaration by one holding or taking title to property in which he or she acknowledges that the property is held in trust for another
